changes.title: Lagoon 2.27.0 - Retention Policies & Smarter Build Queues
changes.description: This release brings retention policies to help manage your project data lifecycle, giving platform owners more control over cleanup automation. We've also upgraded the AWS S3 libraryâ€”if you're using AWS buckets, you may need to set your region in the helm values. New installations now benefit from a streamlined setup process with initial platform-owner and organization configuration. On the build side, the remote-controller now handles queues more efficiently by letting completed builds move to a secondary queue, so new builds aren't stuck waiting behind long-running tasks.
